alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 26 at 1:29AM MST until November 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph. Gusts up to 70 mph, except 60 mph in the Davis Mountains above 6000 ft. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis Mountains above 6000 ft. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Light low flying aircraft can expect severe turbulence near the mountains.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
